title: Michigan husband, wife bowl perfect 300 games on same day
text:
Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Michigan husband, wife bowl perfect 300 games on same day Brian and Nicole Shidler both rolled a perfect 300 game Sunday near Jonesville. Post to Facebook Michigan husband, wife bowl perfect 300 games on same day Brian and Nicole Shidler both rolled a perfect 300 game Sunday near Jonesville. Check out this story on Freep.com: http://on.freep.com/2m5wvR3 Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Michigan husband, wife bowl perfect 300 games on same day Associated Press 4:27 p.m. ET Feb. 21, 2017 Bowling ball and pins. 7 CONNECT COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
JONESVILLE – The bowling pins were falling for a Michigan couple — all of them. 
Brian and Nicole Shidler both rolled a perfect 300 game Sunday at L & J Lanes, a bowling alley near Jonesville, south of Jackson. They were playing together in a mixed doubles tournament, something they hadn’t done in a long time. 
Brian tells the Jackson Citizen Patriot that it was “just one of those things where everything lined up” — and the pins kept falling down. 
Bowling is a big part of the Coldwater couple’s lives. Brian said he was bowling in Texas when he asked his future father-in-law whether he could marry Nicole. He has thrown dozens of 300 games; Nicole now has three.
